tasks.instruction: Enhance the existing React application to enable real-time preview with a floating resizable text box on the preview image. Unite preview and style sections for full real-time preview. Add Hebrew and English font dropdown selection with full Hebrew language support. The floating text box should show all changes in real-time including text position, font selection, text effects, color and size. Implement drag-and-drop positioning, resize handles, and bidirectional text support for Hebrew.
